summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Spokane Street (north side), from Beacon Avenue to 24th avenue South; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing concrete sidewalks, and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8093 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
